import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import"../styles/OrdersList.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OrdersList=()=>{const[orders,setOrders]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{axios.get("http://localhost:5001/api/orders")// ✅ API des commandes
.then(response=>setOrders(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error("❌ Erreur chargement des commandes :",error));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"orders-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Liste des Commandes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"ID"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Client"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Produits"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Total"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Status"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:orders.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tr",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{colSpan:"5",children:"Aucune commande enregistr\xE9e."})}):orders.map(order=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:order.id}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:order.client}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:order.products.map((prod,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[prod.nom," x",prod.quantite]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("td",{children:[order.total," DH"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:order.status})]},order.id))})]})]});};export default OrdersList;
